citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 a.m. on 24-
January 2023.
Contact was made with the licensee and it was relayed that no responsible adult would be available to walk through the
inspection process for the day.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:40 a.m. on 24-
January 2023. 
 
Contact was made with the licensee and it was relayed that no responsible adult would be available to walk through the 
inspection process for the day. 
 
 
 
End Section
